content.detailedDescription: I was reading my son a bedtime story, my boyfriend and my brother in law was talking in the living room when we kept on hearing a helicopter sound very close to the house. we hear helicopters a lot so the first time it went by it was just annoying. the second time the "helicopter" circled i heard the guys mention something about it. the third time the sound came by close enough to vibrate the house. i quickly finished our book and the bedtime ritual to see what was going on. my boyfriend was on the front porch and told me to come look. there was a big, red pulsating light slowly came into focus. it stopped and hovered for a good 10 minutes. suddenly between 3-5 smaller white blinking lights came from somewhere close by the red one. one of the white lights zoomed past an airplane that was passing by. 2 of them went towards the east, and one towards the west. another headed south and stopped what seemed directly over the area, under the cloud cover. it hovered for a couple of minutes, soundlessly. we could actually tell the red one was leaving, it headed south, directly. we came inside to tell the others to come look but by the time we got back outside (maybe 2 minutes) everything was gone. all i could think was "why did we not take a picture of this".
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Heard a helicopter circle around close by the house 3 times. went outside to check it out and saw lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside with my dog, smoking when i heard what i thought was a loud jet, looked up and saw a massive rectangular craft descending much like a plane, however this almost appeared to be more like a giant flying tank or something; it was huge and had no wings or propellers; it was flying very low and appeared to be making a landing nearby, possibly at hill air force base in layton, ut, just south of here. the craft disappeared my view behind some homes before i could take a photograph. this happened just after 7:00 pm, which seems quite early for an experimental craft to be out flying.
content.summary: Massive rectangular object with lights on each of the four corners appeared to be landing just south of my home

content.detailedDescription:
Just outside noticed a bright star--- about as bright and size of sirius---it then moved as in traveling. at first i thought i was "dizzy" but it actually moved! the star traveled from south west to north east in an arc and as it moved farther away it dimmed until i could no longer see it.  aprox 45 seconds from the time i noticed it until it had dimmed.
perhaps falling space debris?
very strange---would love to know if anyone else in the northern ca area of sonoma saw this as well!
content.summary: Moving star

content.detailedDescription: my mom and sister saw these strange lights that seem to go on and off , and my mom caught it on tape.
content.summary: My mom and sister saw these strange lights that seem to go on and off , and my mom caught it on tape.

content.detailedDescription: Out walking my dog when my neighbor shouted from the street if i see what he is seeing.  towards downtown hollywood, there was a large, bright (what looked to be on fire) ball.  when it moved, it left a trail that is similar to a shooting star.  the object would hover, then quickly climb diagonally, then to the side, then drop and shoot up - did this several times, in all directions.  it finally appeared to move away quickly and then just disappeared.  my neighbor said it started off as 3 balls of fire, but two were gone by the time i witnessed this.  definitely have never seen anything like this before.  i grew up in colorado springs where there are tons of military happenings in the sky.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fireballs in sky changing direction quickly

content.detailedDescription: On a summer night in 1955 (give or take a year) around 9:30pm i was coming home from neighbors house and looked up and saw a pie shaped (only sides were concave and round part was more convex) object. it had a luminescent smooth surface about the color of the moon and slightly larger in surface area. the edges were symmetric and defined.  there was no trail behind the object. it was traveling directly (straight line) south to north with no sound. the front was the point and back was round. i spotted it at about 55 degrees above south horizon for about 10 seconds before disappearing behind cumulus clouds at about 75 degrees above north horizon. estimate an altitude of at least 5000 feet or greater. size would depend on actual altitude. this event happened at the kalamazoo address. i was approximately 10 years of age and thought it was a ufo or a large asteroid passing by earth (except it didn't look like an asteroid because of its symmetry). i told my parents, but they didn't believe me.
content.summary: Luminescent proportional pie slice  shaped moon sized object travering south to north above 5000ft.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home when we witnessed a large white light pass by a visible planet at 5:45pm cst.  the object was not as big as the planet to the sw at approximately 50 degrees above the horizon.  the object was at high altitude and traveled slower than most commercial jets at high altitude.  we do have the kansas city international airport within 1 mile but this was not a plane on route to mci.  there were no visible beacons flashing as well as no red or green wing lights.  the object continued in a ne heading until out of sight at a slow rate of speed.  it was impossible for me determine size or altitude.  i do know that this was not like any plane we see flying commercial routes.  planes at high altitude flying at night still have visible beacons and wingtip lights visible.  there was no sound with this object and no change in trajectory.
content.summary: Large bright white light traveling from sw to ne with no flashing beacons or visible wing lights

content.detailedDescription: Went to gym in savile town dewsbury and i saw lots of brown creatures that resembled massive turds with arms and legs and they started to chase me. i think the might have smelt my virgin brown star :)
content.summary: Giant human turd with arms and legs

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i and his son was leaving cedar springs sunday night about 8:30pm on  2/12/12.  i was passenger so i was looking around the sky in the direction  west of 131. as we turned onto 1-96 we watched 2 bright objects very low in the sky the one towards the north was higher and they were changing lights of blue, green, yellow,red and white. all the  way home my instincts said go to coopersville, michigan but we went to grand haven michigan hoping we could get a better view from the lake. when we got there we didn't see it so we headed back towards the east down lake michigan dr. and seen it over coopersville. at that point we could only see the one towards the north. about 10:30pm we didn't have to be convinced so we went home. i looked on the internet and there were no reports for the area.

the feelings were exciting. all of us were tired after we ate but got energy when we seen the lights. i asked the driver to keep driving but  didn't listen to my instincts i wasn't happy about that. none the less after driving for nearly 2hrs we didn't act out my plan

i have been looking in sky for signs and have believed in ufo's since i was young. in 1978 i had a personal encounter and seen the same lights circling my bedroom in a solid beam of lighted colors .And it wasn't flashing! the blocks that were on my wall were approx. 1 foot in diameter with a thin black line to separate the colors. it lasted for several minutes and imagined they were sitting right in the middle of a cross road. i was afraid to look out the window cause i thought i might have been beamed  up, but at that time i heard the sound of their space craft it was the same sound that came out of "lost in space". i asked for them to appear to me and they did but chickened out when it happened. 

the next day there were several hundred phone calls that came into the radio station. i also talked to one of the woman that i worked with the next day and she said her son seen a ufo in wyoming michigan and was wondering if she should believe him or not. i told her yes believe him but didn't tell her my story. she looked very surprise that i said that.
content.summary: Seen 2 multi-colored ufo's over coopersville michigan

content.detailedDescription: After arriving home from work i nightly sit on the back deck of my home from 115am to approx. 215 nightly weather permitting. the deck is less than 15 feet from a river that is roughly 120 yards wide. i heard what at first thought was a helicopter approaching a few feet above the water but quickly realized the sound was barely audible and it passed directly in front of me at eye level with no shape visible and only a whisper of a noise. it passed by at a speed of roughly 50 mph with no wind moving the trees. only the faint whooshing which is how i roughly gauged the speed of movement.    the sound quickly moved downriver maneuvering between the treeline and above the water.   that's all the detail i can really provide.
content.summary: Unseen object passed less than 50 feet in front of deck with barely audible wind noise. a/c worker 22 years and have never witnessed anything similar

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My dad, brother, and i were driving in massachusetts on our way home.  i am always looking at the skies in search of ufos. during the sunset, i glanced up and noticed two objects moving around the clouds. the objects were so abnormal in their appearance and the way they moved that i immediately concluded they were ufos. the two objects were very bright and far away but i could tell they were very large. they were both moving very slow staying within a certain radius and constantly changing direction and appeared to mildly change shape. i was excited to see the phenomenon and we pulled over to observe it for awhile. the objects didn't appear to be leaving anytime soon as i watched for awhile so we continued driving. we tried to keep an eye on them as we were moving but trees got in the way of our vision and more clouds were rolling in.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two odd shaped glowing objects moving around clouds.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i where on our way home when she witnessed something in the sky. when we got home i looked to the sky to see three military jets flying in a circular motion around the city and surrounding area. to the south i witnessed a bright object i had originally believed to be a star or planet to the west start to descend slowly and eventually disappeared. as i continued to watch the jets fly around the sky i saw a bright object hovering slowly at an altitude higher than the planes to the east heading west. then in a split second the object accelerated at an extreme speed westward and disappeared into cloud coverage. the jets continued to monitor the skies for about another hour.
content.summary: Observed military planes flying in the area then witnessed craft shoot across sky and another descend.

content.detailedDescription:
I was not sure of the date of this event but i can work it out because of two events. first, the hale bop comet was visible in the sky which dates it to 1997. second, i was on my roof to see the lunar eclipse which was on the evening of march 23 that year.

after looking at the eclipse i turned to look north, very few stars are visible in the city of london but the big dipper is clear, it was then that i saw a bright silvery white object moving across the sky from the north west to the north east. it was moving at incredible speed and crossed the whole arc of the sky in less than five seconds. it was at high altitude so it's speed was phenomenal to cover so much sky. it seemed to give off it's own light.

it was bright and glowing silver, it had a long pointed body with two short stubby delta wings at the rear, a tail of light glowed from it's rear and shone about the same length as its body. it did not leave a vapour trail in the cloudless night sky and it was completely silent!

i have no idea if it was extra terrestrial but there is no craft, military or civilian, that could move like that and also make no noise. well not one that they have announced to the public. i am a keen sky watcher and know what a satellite looks like, what a star or planet looks like. i know what military or commercial aircraft look like and sound like; this was none of those.

i was elated to have seen such a mysterious object, i felt i had been waiting all my life to see something like that. it was after the event that i realised that the heaven's gate mass suicide, which had just happened, was supposed to have been timed to the arrival of a space ship. i have asked myself was that the ship? did those people know something? also that the price of a ticket was too high.

i have yet to find another witness to this event, i am hoping your records might connect with this event.
content.summary: Extremely fast, silvery white, pointed cylindrical object with stubby delta wings

content.detailedDescription:
Garner, nc 
feb 2012

as i was grabbing the mail from the mailbox, i noticed it and it was just passing through.  after that, about 30 minutes later, went to the back the porch looked out and saw 4 red orbs.  2 going south and 2 going north.


1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?  walking down to the street
2. what made you first notice the object?  i always look up
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?  i knew it was a ufo
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.  just white orb going across the sky.
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.  same as usual as this is not my first one i have seen.
6. how did you lose sight of the object?  i just walked back into the house.. i was going pass my house heading towards adams point.
content.summary: Flying white orb passing through

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i went to the dock where the mayflower ii is tied up this morning at dawn. i was facing east taking sunrise photos then turned to the west to get a shot of the buildings lining the shore and the harbor from our place at the end of the dock.

when i downloaded my pictures just now, i noticed in that one shot what looks like a vertical contrail and, below it, a round shape with two rectangular lights. (neither of us witnessed this prior to seeing it in the photograph.) of course, the shot becomes pixilated when enlarged but it's clear enough that we can both say we've not seen anything like it before. and, it's not at all similar to ufo's we've seen pictures of in the past. 

please note: i checked the other photos i took to see if there was something on my lens that could have caused that image but on no other pictures did that appear.
content.summary: Showed up in photo

content.detailedDescription:
It happend just over 30 years ago around 1980 the wife and i was walking the dog in hollymoorside in chesterfield , derbyshire  when suddenly the dog refused to go any further , he just froze . on looking over too our right the wife and i observed a glowing object moving left to right it was triangle shaped with 3 distinctive colours red , green and yellow .
said object moved slowly to our right as it did this we ran back to my wifes mothers approx 1/2 mile away where her mum , dad and sister all observed said object . the object then hovered above a farm house approx 1 mile in the distance , where a smaller object with the same colours seemed to come out from the larger shape and descend and hover above a farm house for approx 5 mins . it the rejoined the larger object and moved of very slowly to our left . 
 in all this time no other aircraft was seen in the area , the object made no sound so you could rule out aircraft , helicopters ect . a few months later the wife and i telling my father in laws neighbour what we saw and to our suprise he told us he saw the same thing a couple of miles away from where we was . its difficult to recal everything after all this time but feel free to contact me and if possible send further info if required .
content.summary: Quite moving object , triangle shaped red , green and yellow in colour

content.detailedDescription:
File:  hwy 169 screen memory scenario in 2003

the male witness and his then girlfriend were coming back from minnesota at the end of the july 4th weekend in 2003, driving southbound on highway 169 north of adel, iowa.  it was around 2:00 to 2:30 a.M. when a deer came onto the road.  both witnesses saw it, and the driver reacted quickly, and felt relieved when he managed to avoid hitting it.

he drove on a couple miles and there was an ambulance sitting in the middle of the highway with its headlights and tail lights on, and also turned on were the lights that are used to illuminate an area when emt personnel are working an emergency situation.  the red flashing light was not on.  the driver���s door was open, and the back doors of the ambulance were wide open, but there was no one inside or outside the ambulance.  no one in the area, at all, no working of an emergency situation, and yet, there it sat with all those lights on in the middle of the highway.  the witnesses thought it was strange, but the driver slowly drove his car around the ambulance, and drove on for a couple more miles.

then things got stranger.  there was what appeared to be a man standing by the side of the road perfectly still, with his back to the road.  he seemed to be engaged in no activity whatsoever.  there was no vehicle nearby, and there were no farm buildings nearby that would seem to explain his stance, or his presence.  the male witness wondered out loud if they should stop and ask if he needed help, but his girlfriend was really shook up at this point and said ���no, no, don���t stop.���

when they got home that night, they were suspicious enough about what they���d seen to think they should check the time to see if they���d had any missing time, and found that they did get home at the time they expected to.  but, the male witness has always wondered what was going on that night.  and when he attended a ufo adult education class, and there was a discussion of ���screen memory��� incidents, he told investigator trout, so that���s why the incident is being reported now.
content.summary: Apparent 3-part screen memory scenario on hwy 169 in 2003

content.detailedDescription:
Witness went out for a smoke was facing north she noticed what she thought was a plane but it was traveling so fast.Then she realized it was a light.It stopped and hovered.Then noticed a gray ring around it.Round in shape.Then it went slower and made a circle then stright,then a figure eight and hovered again.The light got extremly bright and just disappered.There was no sound and lasted 3-5 minutes.She was the only witness that she was aware of.Witness wondres how anyone could not have seen such a bright light.
light gray sky,high ceiling.Closest building is 150 yards and it appeared to be 4 inches above that.If she could cover it up a golf ball would cover it or a bit smaller.It came from west to east.
two hours later she saw helicoptors flying in many different directions.After dark a couple more showed up.They do see helicoptors from time to time but never that oftn or so many.
she was very excited and called a friend who told her about mufon.Also told her to write this all down.
her stomach was in knots,legs jittery.Cried alot next day,felt a sense of loss.The third day she was fine.Wondered why her.She smoked a few extra cigerrets that day.
she believes in ufos and had been thinking about them latly.
she has seen objects flying stright out on utube but nothing like what she witnessed.
witness is 61 and is a part time web and graphic designer.To her knowledge no family members have ever seen anything like this .
she has no desire to remain anonymous as she is curious if others shared the same experience.
content.summary: Bright light with gray ring around it.Round.Hovered,then slower,then figure 8.Turned brighter then disappered.

content.detailedDescription:
Well i just watch this on tv yesterday so... i would like to know if u can contact them for more infomation in my country almost nobody knows something about mufon so i did it...


i know says not to add links but only there you see it... because i watch it on tv
so the link is:

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Triangle over the main plaza
content.locationName: San Ignacio de Velasco, Santa Cruz

content.detailedDescription:
This report is submitted by chief investigator, beverly trout.  the witnesses are a couple who attended trout���s ufo adult education class in january, 2012���..  on september 6, 2011, at about 9:45 p.M., from their car as they drove along their small hometown street in van meter, a male witness and his wife saw a reddish-orange circular light pass from south to north over the town.  they were curious, so they drove north out of town and parked in the driveway of the iowa veterans cemetery a mile north of town.  looking to their sw and w and nw, they watched as several more (9 in addition to the one they���d seen while still in town) moved through an approximately 3 land miles transit.

total duration is estimated at 10-15 minutes.  they estimate it probably took a couple minutes to drive a bit over one mile to their vantage point north of town, from where they watched an additional 9 lights/objects as they moved into view, going from south to north.  

they watched to their left (looking south) as the objects emerged over the trees south of the town and as the objects moved over the town from south to north, and over a gravel pit lake on the south side of i-80 directly opposite from where witnesses were parked, then on over i-80 to the north where they disappeared over the elevated terrain ��� an estimated 3 miles straight-line trajectory transit.

the far side bank of the gravel pit lake west of the witnesses is estimated at 200 yards (600 feet) land distance from where they were parked.  apparent size of the objects was a dime (1.8 degrees), and they were seeing the objects at about 70 degrees elevation over the lake.  

there was no sound from any of the objects, and witnesses were unable to see any structure.  they could only see the unwavering reddish-orange lights of each object.

one light/object would come into view, move across the sky, then move beyond the witnesses view to the north, at which point, another one would move across the sky and do the same thing, until 8 of the 9 had done so ��� the last one did the same until it got to their right at about 60 degrees & then, instead of continuing to move beyond witnesses line of sight, when it got to their 2 o���clock position, it simply disappeared as they watched it.

both witnesses compare the speed of the objects to a light plane���s speed, in other words, not as fast as a commercial jetliner.
content.summary: 10 reddish-orange light/objects passed over fairly low about 600 feet land distance

content.detailedDescription: I wish i had video of this because i know i am not crazy and i know what a helicopter sounds like and this thing made no noise at all. i was travelling south on 29  on 2/13/2012 at approx. 9:30 pm may have been later i wasnt paying attention to the clock when 4 bright lights caught my attention in the sky. the airport is less than 1 1/2 miles from where this occured  so at first i thought it was a helicopter but it didnt make sense to me. the object was hovering over the powerline right of way on the northbound side of 29 about 1/2 mile from proffit rd. i was intrigued so i pulled over into airport motors to watch this thing.I rolled my window down to listen but the only noise i heard was traffic and my engine. at the distance i was from whatever it was there was no sound at all. this thing was just over treetop level i would guess less than 500 ft for sure and less than 1500 ft from me. i did notice it turn and move from its position towards the airport. i lost sight of it after its turn i didnt see the lights anymore and i didnt witness a high speed acceleration i dont think. i looked and just didnt see it. i saw a plane traveling south of the position to the front of my truck, just after i lost sight of the object. i cant tell you what the fuselage was shaped like because the lights were bright and i couldnt make it out.I realized it turned because the lights shifted position and moved off. i donmt know what it was maybe you guys can have better luck than me. if it was a ufo maybe the airport radar caught it, like i said the airport is less than 2 miles from where this happened. if it was a helicopter it was like nothing i have seen because it made no sound at all.
content.summary: Noticed 4 bright lights in the sky where no light ever are in a straight line over the treetops

content.detailedDescription: Was discovered on the ground in a burned wooded area. upon encounter the object suddenly ascended, hovered, descended, hovered, turned around to reveal a mouth like opening, and kept mobile about 40 seconds. witness was about 3 feet away. i have a video of 40 seconds.
content.summary: White, sting-ray like shape, was discovered on ground and ascended upon encounter, hovered, descended

content.detailedDescription: I was delivering a pizza onto saw road from north enochville avenue, right before i turned onto saw road, i saw a light blue airplane between my left and right, as i turned onto the road, the exact spot where the plane was, it is now a black tube, alonside it were 2 smaller tubes(also black) i could not tell if the 2 smaller tubes were connected, the 2 tubes were that close, i was shaken up, and so distressed i almost ran off the road, yell out loud a few choice words, and since i was driving, i only saw it for about 13 seconds, when i returned, i looked all around and saw no plane, no strange tubes, no nothing.  i now drive everywhere with a media device that can take photos as well as video.
content.summary: Light blue airplane, turned into black tube

content.detailedDescription: Reported on behalf of my wife, who was driving westbound on olympic blvd. at about 6:55 pm today. while stopped at the traffic light at 4th ave., her attention was diverted to what she believed was an airplane on fire. she witnessed this object at her 2 o'clock position [roughly north] and at about 50 degrees up. she immediately called me to report the event and i felt an unusual extreme distress on her voice. i totally felt she was actually witnessing an airplane on fire, she is definitely not the kind of person prone to imagine things. as we were on the phone -not ten seconds later- she witnessed what she described as 4 lights chasing the fiery object. she described these as 'arches', similar to a child-drawn bird, slightly larger than the first object and extremely bright [magnesium white]. she now observed that the apparent fire on the first object looked more like sparks trailing it. the traffic light changed and she had to move. she stopped at the next traffic light where she realized she had lost view of the fiery object. however, she managed to see one of the white glowing arches starting to release sparks. in retrospect, she feels this object was turning into another 'fiery' one. she lost view of all objects by the next traffic light. by the time she arrived home, she sounded just like every honest ufo reporting witness, i.E., believing she saw a 'plane on fire', then realizing she's seen something quite different. the image provided is just an illustration i did by drawing the reported details to the intersection where the event started.
content.summary: Looked like an airplane on fire followed by bright white arches

content.detailedDescription:
Without the risk of sounding absolutely nuts and feeling like i had lost it, i wanted to post this to see if anyone else had seen anything like this during the weekend of 2/10/12. i caught a strange light out of the corner of my eye in the sky while hunting about an hour after dark. i thought it was a descending plane or helicopter but noticed it was moving up and down and left to right very rapidly in and out of view of the tree line that was to my 10 o'clock view from me. it was odd enough for me to pick it out of the little prop planes and airliners that were flying around every once in a while at various altitudes that night. 

when i backed up to get a better look to see what it was i noticed that it looked like a bright star that was moving in pigtail patterns. it looked as if it was falling, and rapidly moving in all directions very inconsistently but almost coming back to the same plane of reference every time it recovered from moving around after a bit. i gauged that by the flashing radio towers along the horizon in the distance. it almost looked like how a balloon or kite looks when it's getting whipped around by the wind but this seemed to find various spots in the sky to kind of hover and coast along. i tried to video from my phone at this point but it was too dark and far enough away that i couldn't see anything in my screen.

i proceeded to call my friend who was on his way and tried to explain to him to hurry due to me being completely freaked out at this point. i had been watching this for about 40-50 minutes by this point. so, not really believing in any of this i went back to camp and wiped my eyes and started looking around at the lights on the horizon for a reference. i spent the next 30 minutes trying to rationalize what it could have been. i watched planes come and go to see if maybe i was just seeing this thing as it was getting closer or further away mimicking the hover effect. but everything just moved on and this one just stayed there. no other lights moved the way this particular light was moving. i even got in my truck and stuck a cigarette pack to my windshield and marked it so i had a reference point for where this light kept moving around.

when i got out of my truck to view this again and try to record it with my phone yet again i noticed the other two orange colored "star-like" orbs. between the three combined, it was more of a triangular shape in the sky. one to to my west, one just south of tyler to my east, and the original white/red/orange light toward the palestine or crockett area to the immediate south of where i was facing. the three covered an extremely huge area but all seemed to be moving independently and all in the same style and manner as the first.

by this point my buddy arrived and he gets out to see what i am looking at and why i was so freaked out. he instantly sees the first star i saw and cocked his head sideways and said "is that thing moving!" we then both watched it calling out the directions it was moving at the same time and we both saw it move the exact same. he began to spend time trying to explain in as i tried to do before he arrived. that's when we saw the spotlights from the southeast come on and they started pointing in random directions. could be completely unrelated but weird none the less. 

we sat and talked for a while trying to scan the sky for anything else that looked abnormal. since it was in the middle of our 1200+ acres in rural country we could see all around us without any type of heavy light pollution. after a total of 2-2 1/2 hours for me, and about an hour or so for him, we noticed the western most light was gone from the mix of stars that was surrounding it. then the second to our east started to fade in and out and that's when we noticed the original light source started moving around and coming in and out of view. finally it was just gone in no sort of spectacular fashion or anything. tried to look for those lights again and saw nothing at all on the second night out there.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 bright orange orbs and 1 white/orange  orb. all looked star-like.

content.detailedDescription: Object was traveling straight then did an abrupt turn and went bact the way it first was traveling from moving very slowly , red lights on each end pulsated in unison , that is how we could tell it was one long object, much too big to be a plane or helicopter maybe 100 yards or longer. object was observed until it was out of sight. was seen by appropriate 5 people, got some video and a few photos, but have not looked at them and am not sure if anything will show up yet.
content.summary: Long with red lights on each end that blinked or pulsated in unison

content.detailedDescription: All day and night hearing way more aircraft noise and activity.The news had said the military would be exercising aircraft that day. that night i was watching tv and got bored and thought i would check out some of the planes flying around. the first thing i noticed was a satellite watched it for a while then noticed a plane circling at a pretty high altitude which i thought was strange. i could also see a few military jets flying over. i'm a huge aviation buff and know what planes look like at night since i've grown up next to an airport my whole life. the object i saw was very black triangular shaped with 3 very dimly lit lights in the pattern of a triangle.It made no noise and was traveling at roughly 350-400 mph what alarmed me was how close it was with no discernible noise! and how dim the lights were,they were not bright enough to be used for identification.My first thought is that it is a classified military aircraft like aurora or the tr-3b and the military was testing it with normal military jets. i also noticed and heard a helicopter and thought it may be a black helicopter that so often appear with ufos. that's my report!
content.summary: Object amid a bunch of otherplanes helis and satellites came across sky low with no noise.

content.detailedDescription: I have already submitted a photo earlier about this event, but did not send the original photo.  this is the original photo as it was taken.
content.summary: This is the original picture of the object uncropped. small craft followed by 6 to 7 others

content.detailedDescription: I was inside cleaning up after dinner, went outside for a cig and looked up to see this extremely bright star like object that appeared to be ascending, then changed course and headed north while maintaining a certain height. it then moved what had to be many miles southward again within seconds, and then stopped above the nearby city of chico, ca or somewhere near its outskirts. i noticed during this time many aircraft suddenly were in the sky in the area around the object. at one point a very dim small glowing sphere shot across the sky and seemed to merge with or disappeared into the star like object. just went outside again and object has completely vanished from the sky.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like object moves erratically across the sky, then hovers.

content.detailedDescription:
I decided to go outside to investigate the orbs in my front yard to see if they were still there from yesterday. i was curious if they were affected by the cold and snow. they seemed not to be and looked to be playing in it.
 
i then went to my back yard and notice a small blueish craft hovering inches above the snow. so i took a picture of it. i didn't notice that it was accompanied by others until i looked at it on my computer.

i am starting to see a lot of them and i can't figure out why, i mean what iis the significance of this area?

well anyway i thought i'd better report it. looked out my back window minutes later and didn't see it anymore.
content.summary: Blue domed craft hovered inches above dog tracks
